INSERT INTO "word_initiative" (initiative_id, key_words_id) VALUES ((select max(id) from "initiative"), #{id});

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "interested" WHERE initiative_id=#{idIni} AND user_id=#{idUser};
mapper.select: SELECT u.id idus, u.name, u.email, u.Type_user tuser, u.lastname FROM "User" as u, "interested" as i WHERE i.initiative_id=#{id} and i.user_id=u.id;

SELECT i.id, i.description, i.area, i.creation_date, i.modify_date, i.user_id, ts.status as status, i.num_votos, kw.word, u.id idus, u.name, u.email, u.Type_user tuser, u.lastname FROM (SELECT ini.* FROM initiative ini, key_words kwo, word_initiative woi where kwo.id=woi.Key_words_id and woi.Initiative_id=ini.id and kwo.word= #{keyword}) as i, Key_words as kw, word_initiative as wi, type_status as ts, "User" as u WHERE kw.id=wi.Key_words_id and wi.Initiative_id=i.id and ts.status = i.type_status_id and i.user_id = u.id ;

SELECT i.id, i.description, i.area, i.creation_date, i.modify_date, i.user_id, ts.status as status, i.num_votos, kw.word, u.id idus, u.name, u.email, u.Type_user tuser, u.lastname FROM Initiative as i, Key_words as kw, word_initiative as wi, type_status as ts, "User" as u where kw.id=wi.Key_words_id and i.id=#{id} and ts.status = i.type_status_id and i.user_id = u.id and wi.initiative_id = i.id;
